text: Can you add a discount to a line item via the API?

Hi, my company has been doing manual imports with excel files.

We have a custom unique property for Company called "CID". It corresponds to a company id in our database. CID has also been added as a contact property in HubSpot.

We have successfully been doing manual imports using that value to associate companies and contacts.

I would like to import some companies and then import contacts using this CID value to associate the contacts with the companies.

I have been testing importing contacts and companies with the "imports" endpoint, but I'm not sure how to make the association work.

Could you please show me how the "importRequest" should be setup for the contacts import and let me know if there is anything else I should be aware of? Let me know if my request is unclear. Thanks.

Hi everyone! Is it possible to have our own web app talk to HubSpot? For example, we can set certain triggers on our end, and if they're activated, HubSpot can generate notifications or a to-do action item for a sales rep / account manager?
Form API (updating): is there any plans to allow a form field to be easily appended to an existing form. At the moment there is a high risk of overwriting / resetting a form via the current API.
